author: fmeschbe
msg: Add README and DISCLAIMER files to the license page display

author: damrhei
msg: This change will ensure that properties set on an SEI's DBC are included when an EndpointDescription is created from an Impl's DBC. Prior to this change, only the Impl DBC's properties were transferred to the EndpointDescription. Now, if an SEI is present, both the SEI and Impl's properties will be transferred to the EndpointDescription instance.

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3581: Changing certain properties on client DataSource objects causes existing connections to reflect the new values.
Removed a boolean flag that was only set to true and used in only one place.
The meaning/use of the flag was also invalid, as new logical connections should not "recompute" its properties from the associated data source.
This patch should not change any behavior, only remove unnecessary code.
